text.section: The Office shall implement a program to promote the production of motion pictures and television programs in the State.

The Office shall:
prepare and distribute promotional and informational materials that address:
desirable locations in the State to produce motion pictures and television programs;
the benefits and advantages of producing motion pictures and television programs in the State; and
the services and assistance available from State government, local government, and the motion picture and television industry;
assist motion picture and television companies to secure location permits and other services in connection with motion picture and television production; and
facilitate cooperation from federal, State, and local governmental units and the private sector in locating and producing motion pictures and television programs.
